11.title: Kim Kardashian

choices: Selena uses the remote around the house
Selena wants to use the remote in the city
Selena's interrupted by a knock at her door
Selena wants to use the remote to take over the world
12.content:
Selena Gomez was on top of the world, a true blue idol that was number one atop all the charts. She literally had it all, popularity, riches, fame, a successful singing career, a phenomenal acting career, and now even a star on the Hollywood walk of fame.

She had the whole entertainment world by the throat and there was no way she was going to it let go. She had finally achieved what all her contemporaries could not... she was a superstar.

There was absolutely nothing and nobody that could dethrone her. She was on top of the mountain. And being on top of the mountain meant that everyone adored you and everyone wanted to send you something. Selena was no stranger to gifts form her fans, or dare she even say admirers.

The only problem was, most of what they sent she already owned. She didn't blame them of course. They didn't know. How could they? A stalker might, but no one had garnered her attention. How did you shop for the woman that could have anything? Even sending money so she could buy herself something was a no go.

The new queen of Hollywood sighed. As she sat in her penthouse overlooking the city, she met with a pile of gifts in the corner that she'd failed to get around to. She was a busy woman after all, it wasn't easy to juggle her success.

Though she figured while she had some free time to herself she might as well see what her adoring public sent her this time. The first gift was a standard red present all neatly held together by a golden bow. Cliché yes, but oh so effective. She tore it open to reveal a set of red heels. They were nice and shiny, alas she already had pair in her closet.

The next gift was a smaller box wrapped in blue snowflake wrapping paper and tapped together rather crudely. Selena didn't mind though when she freed it's contents. Inside was a smartphone that was nearly identical to the one sitting on the coffee table in front of her.

Then there was the big box wrapped in the gold paper. This one's wrapping was deceptive as it was part of the box and the lid could be popped open. Inside was giant stuffed teddy bear that no doubt came from the build a bear workshop.

Before she knew it, the queen of Hollywood had gone through nearly every gift. Each one left her feeling slightly disappointed minus a select few. The bear was nice, the bikinis were cool, and she had to admit she liked the painting of her a fan made. That was definitely going up on the wall.

The last gift in her sights was a rather small thing, not even wrapped, but instead tapped shut. A plain white box. Just like with all the rest, Selena ripped it open only to fin whatever it was was incased in a thin layer of bubble-wrap. Admittedly she took a few seconds to pop the bubble-wrap.

Don't judge, fun is fun.

Anyway, once the trinket inside was free. It was revealed to be what looked like some sort of universal remote. Now that was something actually useful. She couldn't count the amount of times she'd misplaced the T.V remote. And how about that, it even came with batteries.

Now this, was a good gift.

She wasted no time opening the back and inserting the power source. She took aim at her T.V and pressed a button. What happened next left her floored. Her jumbo flat screen became a shrimp flat screen.

"What the fu--"

She looked down at the remote, and back to her T.V. Did this thing just shrink her T.V? She now eyed the remote more carefully and noticed it wasn't like any other remote she'd ever seen. It had all kinds of fancy buttons, dials, and lights. Not to mention a giant "G" and "S" button side by side.

Wanting to test her theory more, she fired the "G" button at her T.V and sure enough it was back to normal. "Oh. My. God."

Selena was stunned. Like all the stories and comic books, she'd found an honest to god size altering remote. Shad to test it again... but how?
12.title: Selena Gomez

123.content:
Before Selena could figure out a way, she was interrupted by a knock at her door. The timing was terrible. She had just found herself a real life size ray and now she was being held up by unwanted company.

Just who was at her door anyway? Was it a friend, the paparazzi, one of her producers? She honestly didn't know and at the moment she didn't really care. All she wanted was to be left alone.

-Knock-

-Knock-

-Knock-

"I so do not need this right now." Selena sighed. Such was the life of a celebrity. Sometimes she wished she could just have some alone time.

That's when it struck her. She had a size remote. She could literally do anything she wanted now. She could just shrink this little annoyance and have some private time. Hell, she might even be able to use the poor sap as a test subject.

-Knock-

-Knock-

-Knock-

"Just one minute!" Selena called. As she walked downstairs towards her door, she felt excited. She held the remote close and wondered just who it was that came a knocking.

Whoever it was, they were in for a whole lot of trouble.
123.title: Annoying interruptions
